design_philosophy.core_concept: NASA Control Center meets Health AI
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode, Glassmorphism, Neon Accents, Data-Dense
key_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix medical sterility with cyberpunk neon.
Content is King: Data must be legible instantly. High contrast is non-negotiable.
Zoom In: Use macro details for blood/cell visuals.
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Group data logically.

usage_rules: Body Text: Use 'Manrope'. Tracking normal. Weight 400.
Data/Numbers: Use 'JetBrains Mono' or 'Manrope' with tabular-nums.

glass_card.classes: bg-[#111623]/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl
glass_card.description: Standard container for dashboard widgets. Must have a subtle inner border.

neon_button.classes: bg-[#ff304f] hover:bg-[#ff304f]/90 text-white shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,48,79,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(255,48,79,0.6)] rounded-lg font-semibold tracking-wide

status_badge.alert: bg-[#ff304f]/10 text-[#ff304f] border border-[#ff304f]/20 px-2 py-1 rounded-md text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wider

universal_guidelines: DARK MODE ONLY: The app should feel like a cockpit at night.
NO GENERIC GRADIENTS: Use subtle radial gradients to highlight active areas, not full linear gradients.
DATA DENSITY: Dashboards should be dense but legible. Use 'text-xs' and 'text-sm' liberally for data tables.
MICRO-INTERACTIONS: All cards should have a subtle hover lift (-translate-y-1) and border lighten.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure red/green status indicators have accompanying text or icons for colorblind users.
TESTING: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors provided in 'colors.tailwind_config_extension'. 2. Update 'index.css' to enforce the dark theme variables by default. 3. Install 'framer-motion' if not present. 4. Build the 'Landing Page' first, then the 'Dashboard'. 5. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
